title: All the Truths
description: The truth doesn't set you free.Revenge shouldn’t be rushed. It needs to be savored.Reina ruined my life and it’s only fair I ruin hers back.Or that was the plan.That was before she got under my skin and flowed into my blood.Life as we know it crashes and burns.All we have left is revenge.Or is it?All The Truths is part of a duet and is not standalone.
author: Rina Kent
